title: [K-12] Technology-Enhanced Learning Exploration: Elementary Social Studies Field Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Fundamental Understanding of Community Structures
context.additional_context: A program for elementary teachers to strengthen field-learning competencies in social studies, emphasizing technology-supported outdoor learning within daily living environments.

learning_goals: Learners can collect and analyze accessibility data for five or more local community facilities using mobile survey tools.
Learners can create and present augmented reality content for three or more historical sites using an AR map application.
Learners can collaboratively write and submit one or more field study reports in small groups (5-6 members) using LMS collaboration tools.

resources: Mobile data collection app (e.g., Google Forms)
AR content creation tool (e.g., Spark AR)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
